record.description: Headed by Dr. Charles B. Huggins, the Committee on Cancer is a group of scientists who will direct the University of Chicago's tremendous assault on cancer. Standing, left to right: Dr. Paul C. Hodges, Prof. Albert L. Lehninger, Prof. John Hutchens, Dr. Edward M. Davis, Dr. Leon O. Jacobson, Prof. Harold C. Urey, and Prof. Carl R. Moore. Seated: Dr. Lowell T. Coggeshall, Dr. Anna Hamann, Dr. Charles B. Huggins, Dr. James Franck and Dr. E. S. Guzman-Barron. (Group members not pictured: Dr. Paul E. Steiner, Prof. R. Wendell Harrison, Earl A. Evans Jr., Dr. Lester R. Dragstedt, Dr. Austin M. Brues, Prof. Morris S. Kharasch, and Prof. Raymond E. Zirkle).
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
